mapper.insert: insert into noticeboard(num,title,content, regdate,files) values( noticeboard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{files} )
mapper.select: select * from (select b.*, rownum r from (select * from noticeboard order by regdate desc) b) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
mapper.update: update noticeboard set readcount=readcount+1 where num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM noticeboard WHERE num = (SELECT MAX(num) FROM noticeboard)
